page.title: 18Children's Play Dalgety Bay.
page.content: During the winter months children's outdoor activities are limited. When it snows, children can be seen having snowball fights, making snowmen and sledging. Indoors they watch their favourite television programmes such as The A Team, Fame and the News. Some children use their home computers to play adventure games. Summertime is the best time of the year because you can go for long walks along the beach and through the woods. Children have to make their own amusement because there are no facilities in Dalgety Bay. Facilities such as a cinema, bowling alley, swimming pool, skating rink and tennis courts are available in Inverkeithing, Aberdour and Dunfermline but these all involve travel from Dalgety Bay.
